summary: Website project to build and deploy an interactive "flowers chain" game and add relevant, interesting site content.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Set of 6 distinct flat flower tile icons on transparent background (flowers-tile-set.dim_512x512.png)
- Soft pastel floral game background/banner (flowers-chain-bg.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a new dedicated Flowers Chain game experience as a patient-accessible route (e.g., `/game/flowers-chain`) and implement the interactive game in the frontend (no backend persistence required). The game must: (1) render a grid/board of flower tiles, (2) allow the user to create a chain by dragging or clicking adjacent matching flowers, (3) award points based on chain length, (4) provide clear start/restart controls, and (5) show an end condition (e.g., moves or timer) with a results screen.

Update the Home page “Flowers Chain” promo card to navigate into the new Flowers Chain game route (instead of the current `/details/game` content-only screen), while keeping the other promo cards unchanged.

Add relevant, interesting, English-language content to complement the Flowers Chain experience. This must include: (1) a short “How to Play” section on the game screen, and (2) a small rotating set of calming, wellness-oriented micro-content related to flowers/relaxation (e.g., short facts or grounding prompts) displayed near the game (client-side rotation; no backend required).

Integrate optional calming audio controls on the Flowers Chain game page using a locally bundled audio file (play/pause and volume or mute). The game must remain fully usable if audio cannot autoplay or is unavailable.

Ensure all new game visuals (flower tiles and an optional soft background/banner for the game page) are added as static assets and used by the UI from `frontend/public/assets/generated` (do not proxy images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a "flowers chain" game for the site (playful interactive element).
Add relevant and interesting content to the site to complement the game/experience.

projectName: Add Flowers Chain mini-game and enrich site content
